author: Zeeshan Waheed
comment: I am using this for weather and maps (love the live update on the map as you edit). I think it is a great effort. Yes there are glitches but it deserves a better rating so giving it 5 stars. Also donated $5 to remove ads. Please keep working on this developer. It's good to see something more than the usual video casting apps!

author: Tristram Bovell
comment: First impressions are mixed. There are some glitches with the bottom advert, that needs to be sorted urgently. Looking at comments below, I agree, we need a preview built into the app. Also, it would be good to see some developer responses to the comments left here. Feedback man!!! Talk to the people who want to use your app.

author: Vzw Care
comment: Works really well, love the auto connect option.   Wish there was a preview mode in the app, but that's not super important.   Tip: use with HDMI-CEC and your TVs built in scheduled off command to turn on and off your TV without any action if your own

author: Austin Fathman
comment: A lot of good potential here with a few major issues: 1. Calendar doesn't refresh. If you don't re-cast every day, you'll have events being shown that are long past displaying. 2. The notes section is terribly broken. In order to get the white font to show up on the cast screen, I have to write text that is invisible (white) on the phone.

author: Eric Schneider
comment: This is the Chromecast app I've been waiting for. A little rough around the edges but still exactly what I've wanted for a Chromecast dashboard. Would love to see support for a Google Play Music or Spotify widget...that would make this app near perfect in my eyes.

author: Kevin Davison
comment: Was doing great. Only had a few options to decide from and when it kept saying 7 below when it was 23 above, I knew there was no use for this app with no other decent choices.

author: Kevin Duvernay
comment: all in all app looks good. sets up easy. casts s dash with customizable content.. I would give a better rating but I causes Chromecast to reboot. which makes it unusable.. for me that is..  ifttt support would be an awesome new feature..

author: Heather Gelabert
comment: So much potential, but won't run right now at all. And before it started consistently crashing, it was really glitchy. Also, it would be nice if they kept a comprehensive list of RSS news and audio urls other than the 5 bbc stations listed. But I look forward to this coming together and being totally awesome!

author: Lindsey Cosper
comment: When I saw this app I got pretty excited thinking I could have a little "home screen" type of thing. It works great, just the options to choose from is not really anything​ I would choose from except the weather but even that is wrong! It would be nice to see either a news story ticker, or something about new movie, DVD release, SOMETHING! Add that and this would be worth something. Right now it's crap in a bag. Sorry google! I love most of your apps so I was shocked at this

Decent app, but needs an update badly. Map information only shows how long a commute would be with traffic, it doesn't actually reflect current traffic conditions. Also alarms / automatically connecting I feel could be reworked a bit as it hasn't been working all the time for me.

author: Simon Kitchener
comment: I have been looking for something like this for a long time to bring all the Productivity apps under one dash so I can start the day knowing what's coming... on the TV! This is great! I had a bit of trouble setting up the spacing for the first column, but in the end use the note feature to put up a title, 'Dashboard' which pushed down the clock and weather and set them nicely. Two tweaks I'd love to see; My Google Keep reminders as a widget, and some kind of alarm setting that would automatically cast it in the morning. Maybe IFTTT compatability? Edit: alarms have been added and work great!

author: Philip Noseworthy
comment: This is absolutely brilliant! The ONLY draw back is that I currently can't use it on my Nexus Player or Android TV natively... Please, if it wouldn't take too much coding, can you make this able to be loaded on the Nexus Player without casting it from my phone / tablet? Cheers!

author: David Johnson
comment: Great functional app to cast our family's daily agenda. It took a little time to setup the way I wanted.  Now, we have everything we need to see each day cast to a monitor in the kitchen  A few things need some tweaking to make the experience even better.
Fantastic app. Just what I've been looking for but it hast worked at all the past couple of weeks on 2 separate devices. Just force closes. Sent a bug report but nothings been fixed.

author: Jeffery Plunkett
comment: Although it has at times been a bit "glitchy," it seems to have "stabilized" and is working OK now.  I would like to see a bit more of a wider selection of available widgets, such as perhaps a photo widget, and perhaps the availability of more than five columns (although with my 32-inch TV, I am a bit limited on screen "real estate" for that).  Being the total information geek that I am (I don't care), I leave it up on the screen most of the time and appreciate the easy access to information.

author: Tim Josephson
comment: Tons of potential, but lacking in some areas. Agenda calendar needs something to divide the days. Alarms not reliable to turn on tv. Otherwise, best app for this but needs tweaks

author: Jesse Russell
comment: Worked fine for about an hour or so. Now when trying to cast it crashes instead. Would totally give 5 stars if it worked without crashing! 😍

author: Antonio Lopez
comment: I like this app, would like to have more control on fonts, integration with YT and Google now and Google Music or other music rather BBC!, I saw some plans in that route, so I like the app! BTW, it's a hidden Gem! but needs improve...

author: Kevin Leroy
comment: Custom backgrounds simply don't work. Map is useless. Not a lot of choices in widgets.

author: steven kimbell
comment: Glitchy. Maps dont always zoom correctly, calendar is too large to view entire day, weather converts to metric on its own, etc.

author: David greenseeker
comment: Great App. Very handy for family Calendar. Wish the photo backdrops would let me select local MicroSD card and network drive folder to shuffle through.

author: Marius Filo
comment: Good work, but... - Tryed 10+ rss feeds and for every one of the all I got was "unable to get rssfeed" - maybe some transparency applied to widgets would be nice

author: Vivian Lee
comment: Great idea. However, Chromecast keeps crashing when I try to edit my widgets.

author: Chris Driver
comment: Great concept but the alarm just does not work. I've had it installed on several different devices over the last 2 years and it has never worked properly. This time it's been installed on a Nexus 6p for about 3 weeks and the alarm has worked once in that time.

author: Andie Smith
comment: The ad at the bottom scrolls up to the top and stays in front of the settings, making it impossible to set up widgets. What use is it if I can't set it up?

author: Yasir Al-Hilali
comment: 4 stars purely for the potential that this app has. Otherwise its got glitches and lacks many core features let alone extras that would make this app great. An update needs to do the following: - fix glitchy ad bar that moves the "+" button constantly - add capability to move widget order around - use existing backdrops from chromecast instead of custom ones - have some motion attached like cycling the widgets around screen to prevent burn in  Extras: - add spacer widgets with custom height - position control and placement interface a la  typical android homescreen - open up for third party notifications

author: Prem Shah
comment: Great Start. Would love to have Pro Version upgrade for a price. Would be a great app if certain features can be implemented such as Personalize Music Gadget, Smart Home features (Nest Thermostat, Ring Doorbell, August Lock, Smart things integration), automation integration (Tasker, Auto Voice, Auto Notification)

author: Andrei Aronet
comment: Brilliant app, useful and well designed! Highly recommended. Would love the ability to increase font sizes for those sleepy morning eyes.

author: Jacob Erickson
comment: It's a great idea and a good app to see everything at once on your TV. However, the auto reconnect doesn't work for me (Note 8), even after purchasing the app, uninstalling and reinstalling it. It would be perfect if it did. Would change review if it was fixed.

author: Rick Salvi
comment: You need to fix the problem with the ads. They scroll up and make it impossible to use the app.

author: Joel Kursawe
comment: Keeps crashing whenever I open it and try to cast to TV. Using Google pixel. Cannot get it to start app at all now.

author: Tiago Correia
comment: Great app, but I would prefer to have the agenda not scrolling, so I can always see the most recent events. Maybe in the agenda we could define the number of days to display. I use this to display my agenda in the morning in the TV.

author: Lewis Johnston
comment: Works great! I'd love to see additional widgets including a custom iframe widget. An emergency alerts thing would be awesome.

author: Alex D
comment: This is a good start. I would like more intuitive layout settings with dragging widgets around instead of playing with some numbers.
Great for everyday use. Love what it does! Sometimes Chromecast crashes when modifying components from the app.

author: Fran Peluc
comment: The size of the widgets do not adapt to the screen size. So we cannot see some of them

author: Colin Gilbert
comment: I can't use this app. The display is very jittery I can hardly make out what I'm supposed to do.

author: Deepak John
comment: It never works, tried it so many times with my Chromecast. Need the money back.

author: Don Bush
comment: Seems ok so far, haven't had a chance to use it a whole lot yet
Great idea and execution. Love the background pictures. Best thing to turn on in the morning and stream some BBC radio and see my day on the screen.  Love it
